lib.name: lib
lib.description: Shared utility functions, constants, and type definitions (automatically installed)

waveform-monitor.name: waveform-monitor
waveform-monitor.description: High-performance multi-trace waveform display for real-time sensor data with WebGPU acceleration. Renders 10,000+ points per trace at 60fps. Perfect for medical vitals (ECG, SpO2), aerospace telemetry, and defense applications.

gantt-chart.name: gantt-chart
gantt-chart.description: Mission timeline and task scheduling visualization with resource allocation, priority levels, and interactive timeline views. Perfect for satellite pass planning, mission control, and operations scheduling.

msdf-text-renderer.name: msdf-text-renderer
msdf-text-renderer.description: Multi-channel Signed Distance Field text rendering for crisp text at any scale. WebGPU-accelerated with perfect anti-aliasing. Ideal for HUD displays, tactical interfaces, and high-resolution text rendering. Requires pre-generated MSDF font atlas.

shape-2d-renderer.name: shape-2d-renderer
shape-2d-renderer.description: WebGPU-accelerated 2D shape renderer with SDF-based anti-aliasing. Renders 10,000+ shapes at 60fps including lines, circles, rectangles, rounded rectangles, arcs, and polygons. Perfect for HUD interfaces, tactical displays, instrument panels, and diagramming.
